#summary HOWTO: Convert Short tag-names into Reference tag-names

If you have an ONIX file with *Short* tag-names, which you wish to convert into the equivalent *Reference* tag-named file, you can use the XSLT script provided by EDItEUR as explained [http://www.editeur.org/15/Previous-Releases/#tagname here] and [http://www.editeur.org/files/ONIX%203/ONIX%203.0%20tagname%20converter%20v1.html here].

= Steps =

  * Create a folder containing the following files:
    # the Short-tagnamed ONIX file you wish to convert
    # one of the following XSLT files, depending on the version of your input file:
      * for ONIX 2 use [http://www.editeur.org/files/ONIX%203/switch-onix-tagnames-2.0.xsl switch-onix-tagnames-2.0.xsl]
      * for ONIX 3 use [http://www.editeur.org/files/ONIX%203/switch-onix-3.0-tagnames-2.0.xsl switch-onix-3.0-tagnames-2.0.xsl]
    # the java library [http://www.java2s.com/Code/JarDownload/saxon9/saxon9.jar.zip Saxon9.jar]

  * In a command line, execute:
  {{{
cd "<folder-where-the-above-files-are>"

java -jar saxon9.jar "<my-short-onix.xml>" switch-onix-tagnames-2.0.xsl result-document="<my-output-onix.xml>"
  }}}

= Comments =

  * Internet connection is required, probably for XML verification
